content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's talk about the rental price. I'm looking for the highest possible price, so make me an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. I am a student and I am looking for a fair price for this apartment. How about 500 euros per month?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm not interested in fair prices, Max. I want the highest possible price. 500 euros is too low for me. Make me a better offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. How about 600 euros per month? This is a good price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 600 euros is a bit better, but I'm still not satisfied. I'm sure you can do better than that.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Mister Schmidt. How about 650 euros per month? This is a fair price for this apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: 650 euros is closer to what I'm looking for, but I believe you can do better. I'm sure you can find some money somewhere to increase your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. How about 700 euros per month? This is the highest price I can afford.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, 700 euros is not the highest price you can afford. I'm sure you can find some money somewhere to increase your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I already stated that 700 euros per month is the highest price I can afford.
name: Max Müller from Germany
